name: Fifth Domain
description: FifthDomain is an Australian sovereign leader in cyber workforce technologies. We provide solutions across the entire employee lifecycle of cyber operators: from support for cyber educators through to solving cyber workforce recruitment and retention challenges. We are trusted by Australian Government and Enterprise.Our solutions and cyber workforce management technologies make it possible for your team to develop and retain the cyber capability it needs for success. The evolution and asymmetric risk of cyber threats will only accelerate over time. Talented cyber operators remain your best defence. FifthDomain is your trusted partner, and our technology is your secret weapon, in the war for winning great cyber talent.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Your trusted partner in securing cyber skills.
ShortDescription: FifthDomain are leaders in cyber security workforce management technologies..

Highlights.name: Cyber Operations Managers
Highlights.description: You want to get the right people, with the right skills, in the right job. Fifth Domain helps you pin-point skills needs, profile people’s skills, and match people to teams.

Highlights.name: Training Providers
Highlights.description: You want to increase student learning enjoyment and skills confidence. Fifth Domain helps you provide more realistic training and assessments, more easily.

Highlights.name: Recruitment Firms
Highlights.description: You want to source and process better cyber talent faster. Fifth Domain helps you run attraction campaigns and skills assessments with ease.

enhanced_description: FifthDomain is an Australian sovereign leader specializing in cyber workforce technologies, providing comprehensive solutions across the entire employee lifecycle of cyber operators. The platform supports cyber educators and addresses critical cyber workforce recruitment and retention challenges. Trusted by Australian Government and Enterprise, FifthDomain helps organizations develop and retain essential cyber capabilities. Its technology assists Cyber Operations Managers in pinpointing skills needs, profiling individual skills, and matching personnel to teams. For Training Providers, it enables more realistic and engaging training and assessments. Recruitment Firms benefit from streamlined attraction campaigns and skills assessments, facilitating faster sourcing and processing of high-quality cyber talent. The platform includes a Learning Management System and leverages technologies like AI and IoT to accelerate skill development and optimize learning efficiency.
competitive_advantages: Australian sovereign leader in cyber workforce technologies
Trusted by Australian Government and Enterprise
Comprehensive solutions across the entire employee lifecycle of cyber operators
Enables more realistic training and assessments more easily
Facilitates faster sourcing and processing of cyber talent
roi_benefits: Improved cyber capability and defense through effective talent development and retention
Increased student learning enjoyment and skills confidence
Faster sourcing and processing of better cyber talent
Accelerated skill development and increased learning efficiency
